name: spo-get-everyone-everyoneexceptexternalusers
title: Audit 'Everyone' and  'Everyone except external users' claim within a SharePoint site
shortDescription: Audit 'Everyone' and  'Everyone except external users' claim within a SharePoint site
longDescription: As part of Microsoft 365 Copilot readiness, you may want to find where 'Everyone' and 'Everyone except external users' claims are granted permissions which is a cause of oversharing. This script will help you audit the 'Everyone' and 'Everyone except external users' claims within your SharePoint site collection.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
